targets.query: SELECT last("transceiver_info/optics_serial_no") FROM "gNMI-Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:/optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("host_name" =~ /^$zrplus_demo_host2$/ AND "name" =~ /^$dco_demo_host2_optics_contr$/) AND $timeFilter
